result.reason: The user requires batch editing to make inheritance useful (e.g., enabling inheritance for multiple connections simultaneously), which is currently not supported as the properties panel only reflects a single selection.
result.approach: Enable multi-selection awareness in ConfigWindow. Update ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid to use SelectedObjects for batch editing. Modify ConnectionTree to pass the list of selected nodes to ConfigWindow.
